sourcesContent:
Contact Us

Thank you for your message!

Name: {{contactFormModel.name}}

Email: {{contactFormModel.email}}

Message: {{contactFormModel.message}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact', templateUrl: './contact.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact.component.css'] }) export class ContactComponent implements OnInit { constructor(){} ngOnInit(): void { } contactFormModel = { name: '', email: '', message: '' }; submitted = false; submitForm() { // Logic to submit the form to your backend server or perform any other desired action // Once the form is submitted successfully, set submitted to true to display the thank you message this.submitted = true; } }
